item.description:
The story of a young teacher in Germany, who experiments with using soccer to teach English. In German with English subtitles.  After the film, we'll go for crepes.

Details & links in the email that I sent on Saturday.

***UPDATE AS OF SATURDAY AM***

I limited the size of the group because the group is getting a bit large for the crepe place.  If you are on the waiting list, you are welcome to join us for the film, but I don't want to overwhelm the creperie.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby. I'll have an EU flag printed on standard size paper. I'll also give my mobile number to anyone who signs up by 7AM Sunday.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: German Film, French Crepes
